title: Bug 24969JP GP: showing JavaEditor pref. page with editor open
description: Bug 24969JP GP: showing JavaEditor pref. 1016 integration build, only on Japanese aixI realize that we don't claim support for this yet, so I'm just logging it as acase to test once we think that DBCS Motif is ready.
SR: page with editor open open a java editor on a .java file WindowPreferences go to page JavaEditor press OK, will get the attached GP
